trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for read/write server controls.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
This control designer provides the ability to drop controls onto the control for this designer.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
The HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
Maps a property, including description and value, to an intrinsic HTML style.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> method is obsolete.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method for equivalent control designer functionality.
this method must be overridden in a derived class to implement the designer.
The name of the property to map.
The value of the property.
Provides notification that is raised when a behavior is attached to the designer.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> method is obsolete.
Use the members of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property instead.

For example, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> methods on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to map properties to styles.

Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event occurs after a property has been changed.
This method allows implementers to do any processing that may be needed after a property change.
The object sending the event.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that provides data for the event.
Refreshes the display of the control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner> class is obsolete.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
